item.title: Types of Fun
item.description: Type Fun in the moment Fun when looking back 1 Yes Yes 2 No Yes 3 No No Type three fun is the sticking point for most people: […] [I]t’s the type that makes most of us go crawling back to Type 1, and say, “The heck with Type 2, because it’s just too damned close to Type 3.
